PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-10342008-06-11,  ,  ND,  , 
ActNational Defence Act
PrecisReappointment of COMMANDER PETER JAMES LAMONT, an officer of the Canadian Forces who is a barrister or advocate of at least 10 years standing at the bar of the Province of Ontario, as a military judge, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective June 16, 2008.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of COMMANDER PETER JAMES LAMONT, an officer of the Canadian Forces who is a barrister or advocate of at least 10 years standing at the bar of the Province of Ontario, as a military judge, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective June 16, 2008.
